QuestData.Title: A New Dawn
QuestData.Description:
House Stormsong may be lost, but this valley still holds so much hope.
Sam knew that from the beginning.
We have to continue to help the Storm's Wake in any way we can. There are still remnants of the fallen house everywhere, and whoever turned them to this darkness is out there as well.
Cyrus and the others will want to hear about everything that happened. We should tell them together.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Taelia in the Harbormaster's Office in Boralus.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Taelia in the Harbormaster's Office in Boralus.
QuestData.RewardText: I've filled them in on most of the details already. The Storm's Wake will be an invaluable ally if we're to reunite Kul Tiras.
